snippet.title: Heavy Hitters Weapon Pack | Crime Boss: Rockay City [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Free for a limited time on Xbox Series X|S, PS5 and Epic - get the Heavy Hitters Weapon Pack!

The items include:
Baseball Bat with nails – Score a home run with added pain.
SAM-AF1 – For when you need an exotic touch to your self defense.
Reaper’s Saw – And they say size does not matter.
Rufus – Classy and effective, since civil war.
Rufus Short – For increased efficiency in close quarters.
PDW – Personal defense at its finest.

The pack will be available to use in both Baker’s Battle and Crime Time modes.

Remember it's only free for a limited time - so get going boss!
